mapper.insert: INSERT INTO projectwaco.Post(writer_id, title, content, picture) VALUES (#{writer_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{picture})
mapper.select: SELECT post_id FROM Post ORDER BY post_id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT Post.post_id, picture, title, tag_name, form_count FROM (projectwaco.Post JOIN projectwaco.Tag ON Post.post_id = Tag.post_id)
SELECT writer_id FROM projectwaco.Post where post_id = #{post_id}
SELECT Post.post_id, picture, title, form_count FROM projectwaco.Post where writer_id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM projectwaco.Post WHERE (Post.title LIKE #{searchText} OR Post.content LIKE #{searchText})
